title: Farmer
body:
Hello Nick!
how are you
<<if visited("Farmer.TakeRose")>>
Thank you so much for helping us earlier.
Betty is already feeling way better.
Bless you for your deeds
<<else>>
I'm glad to see you but you found me in a bad time.
<<if visited("Farmer")>>
    Like I told you previously.
<<endif>>
My dearest Betty is sick.
It would be great if you could find some medicine.
Theres a rare flower called "Thornrose",
I'm sure if you could find that Betty's health would improve
-> Where do I find the rose?
    [[Farmer.RoseDirections]]
-> Here you go! <<if $rose>>
    [[Farmer.TakeRose]]
-> I'll find it for you!
    Thanks, dear.
<<endif>>

title: Farmer.TakeRose
body:
Thank you so much!
You are a true darling.
Betty will feel better in no time.

title: Farmer.RoseDirections
body:
I saw one a few days ago.
In the south, close to the flowershop.
I'd go there myself but I can't leave Betty alone.
